title: Incorrect 'Build' Popup Action Enablement
description: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled. Even if the user goes to Preferences > Workbench and selects 'Perform build automatically on resource modification,' the 'Build' menu option still appears in the Java popup menus. This behavior seems incorrect.
OB: The 'Build' action is always enabled in the Java perspective's popup menu, even when the 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' option is selected in Preferences > Workbench.
EB: The 'Build' action in the Java perspective's popup menu should only be enabled when 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' is not selected in Preferences > Workbench.
SR:
1. Open Eclipse in the Java perspective.
2. Go to Preferences > Workbench.
3. Select 'Perform build automatically on resource modification.'
4. Right-click on a Java resource in the project explorer.
5. Observe that the 'Build' action is still enabled in the popup menu.
